data.Sentence_cn: 一旦你把汽车停错了地方，交通警很快就会发现。
data.Sentence: If you park your car in the wrong place, a traffic policeman will soon find it.

data.Sentence_cn: 如果他没给你罚单就放你走了，算你走运。
data.Sentence: You will be very lucky if he lets you go without a ticket.

data.Sentence_cn: 然而，情况并不都是这样，
data.Sentence: However, this does not always happen.
Traffic police are sometimes very polite.

data.Sentence_cn: 我发现我的车上有这样一个字条：“先生，欢迎您光临我们的城市。这里是禁止停车区域。
data.Sentence: I found this note on my car: 'sir, we welcome you to our city. This is an "No Parking" area.

data.Sentence_cn: 如果您对我们街上的标牌稍加注意，您在此会过得很愉快的。
data.Sentence: You will enjoy your stay here if you pay attention to our street signs.
This note is only a reminder.'

data.Sentence_cn: 如果你收到这样的恳求，你是不会不遵照执行的！
data.Sentence: If you receive a request like this, you cannot fail to obey it!
